PositionHistory.Title: PL/SQL Developer
PL/SQL Developer
PL/SQL Developer
PL/SQL Developer
Oracle Developer

CompetencyEvidence.name: Alias
CompetencyEvidence.StringValue: Over 6 years of experience in Application Development

ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: This candidate has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 6 years. Currently this candidate is employed as a PL/SQL Developer at United Shore Financial Services. This candidate has extensive knowledge of Oracle PL/SQL, SQL, Microsoft SQL*Loader, Oracle 10G, shell scripting, Oracle Forms, UNIX, TOAD, Java, Oracle Report, Oracle Designer 2000, Perl Programming, Oracle, ETL, XML, SQLPlus, Oracle Applications, Oracle 9i, Microsoft Access, JDBC, HTML, Stored Procedures, SDLC, Reports 6i, Oracle tools, Oracle Developer 2000, Logic Works ERwin/ERX, Java Swing. So far this candidate has not gained any managerial experience.
